publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-103# RAF Buchan (lodged on 30 August 1999) Brian Adam*

*S1M-103 Richard Lochhead: RAF Buchan—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to convey to Her Majesty’s Government support for the local campaign to retain RAF Buchan in the North East of Scotland, in recognition of its crucial role in the local community, and to assist local officials with their efforts on the campaign’s behalf.

S1M-103 # Richard Lochhead: RAF Buchan—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to convey to Her Majesty’s Government support for the local campaign to retain RAF Buchan in the North East of Scotland, in recognition of its crucial role in the local community, and to assist local officials with their efforts on the campaign’s behalf. Supported by: Brian Adam, Irene McGugan*
S1M-103# RAF Buchan (lodged on 30 August 1999) Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-103# Richard Lochhead: RAF Buchan—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to convey to Her Majesty’s Government support for the local campaign to retain RAF Buchan in the North East of Scotland, in recognition of its crucial role in the local community, and to assist local officials with their efforts on the campaign’s behalf. Supported by: Brian Adam, Irene McGugan, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-103# RAF Buchan (lodged on 30 August 1999) Dr Winnie Ewing*

S1M-103# Richard Lochhead: RAF Buchan—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to convey to Her Majesty’s Government support for the local campaign to retain RAF Buchan in the North East of Scotland, in recognition of its crucial role in the local community, and to assist local officials with their efforts on the campaign’s behalf. Supported by: Brian Adam, Irene McGugan, Nora Radcliffe, Dr Winnie Ewing
S1M-103# RAF Buchan (lodged on 30 August 1999) Mr Alex Salmond*

S1M-103# Richard Lochhead: RAF Buchan—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to convey to Her Majesty’s Government support for the local campaign to retain RAF Buchan in the North East of Scotland, in recognition of its crucial role in the local community, and to assist local officials with their efforts on the campaign’s behalf. Supported by: Brian Adam, Irene McGugan, Nora Radcliffe, Dr Winnie Ewing, Mr Alex Salmond

S1M-103# RAF Buchan (lodged on 30 August 1999) Christine Grahame*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Colin Campbell*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr John McAllion*, Mr Mike Rumbles*, Ben Wallace*, Alex Johnstone*, Bruce Crawford*

S1M-103# Richard Lochhead: RAF Buchan-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to convey to Her Majesty's Government support for the local campaign to retain RAF Buchan in the North East of Scotland, in recognition of its crucial role in the local community, and to assist local officials with their efforts on the campaign's behalf. Supported by: Brian Adam, Irene McGugan, Nora Radcliffe, Dr Winnie Ewing, Mr Alex Salmond, Christine Grahame, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr Andrew Welsh, Colin Campbell, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr John McAllion, Mr Mike Rumbles, Ben Wallace, Alex Johnstone, Bruce Crawford
S1M-103# RAF Buchan (lodged on 30 August 1999) Fergus Ewing*, Mr David Davidson*
